parameters.name: BandwidthLimit
parameters.description: The maximum bandwidth value of the inter-region connection. Unit: Mbit/s.

parameters.name: BandwidthType
parameters.description:
The bandwidth allocation method. Valid values:

**BandwidthPackage**: allocates bandwidth from a bandwidth plan.

parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the CEN instance.

parameters.name: LocalRegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the local region.

You can call the [DescribeChildInstanceRegions](~~132080~~) operation to query regions where you can attach network instances to a CEN instance.

parameters.name: OppositeRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer region.
